diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Diverticulitis, End-Stage Renal Disease secondary to MPGN s/p Renal Transplant
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of diverticulitis was supported by abdominal CT findings showing a prominent diverticula with surrounding inflammation and thickening of the sigmoid colon. The patient presented with lower left quadrant abdominal pain, which was relieved by bowel movement. Laboratory findings indicated elevated white blood cell count consistent with infection.
